descriptions.400: The request could not be understood. Please check your input and try again.
descriptions.401: Authentication is required to access this resource. Please sign in to continue.
descriptions.402: Payment is required to access this content. Please complete the transaction.
descriptions.403: Access to this resource is restricted. You don't have permission to view this page.
descriptions.404: The page you're looking for has drifted beyond the horizon.
descriptions.405: The requested method is not supported for this resource.
descriptions.406: The server cannot provide a response in the format you requested.
descriptions.408: Your request took too long to complete. Please try again.
descriptions.409: There's a conflict with the current state of the resource.
descriptions.410: This resource is permanently gone and will not return.
descriptions.413: The request payload exceeds the maximum size allowed.
descriptions.429: You've made too many requests. Please slow down and try again later.
descriptions.500: An unexpected error occurred on our end. We're working to fix it.
descriptions.502: The gateway received an invalid response. Please try again shortly.
descriptions.503: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please check back soon.
descriptions.504: The gateway timed out waiting for a response. Please try again.
